title: Banner of command in OFA is bullshit: AP champs mostly not viable
body: Seriously it negates the value of AP champs when some immune to magic damage cannon minion comes down with enhanced health

At least one person NEEDS to go with some alternate build purely because there's only four gold sources on the map.

TBH AP champions can still deal with banner pretty effectively most of the time. Clear the wave around the banner minion, then your tower (+minions sometimes) can gang up on it and beat it into submission. The tower still does 40%/70% to melee/ranged, so if it's not a cannon, the tower makes *very* short work of it after that.
I think what he's talking about is the entire enemy team building it and then making five minions immune to magic damage.

Was in a team of 5 Yi's the other day and we were up against 5 Brands and I told everyone on my team to build Banner.

God did I realize how stupid this item is in this game mode.
I don't even play OFA and can see why this is a huge problem.

Banner gives these types of champions a chance.

but that doesn't work against an ad champ like sivir, and its just an auto win against a ap champs who doesn't have better wave clear then the other team to begin with. and if they are already winning to begin with it makes it so the ap team has no chance

Also ahri is a bad example because she has true damage. Also should 1 champion change the entire kit of a player? Because it also does. Should champions have reduced waveclear or something in one for all because of this? Full ap team comps with great waveclear force the enemy to play around them, why should the enemy team be forced to play around them but it's too much to ask for the ap champions to do the same?
